Name: Save and export (PlcOpenXml)
Desc: Saves the project and exports all data to the folder of the active project in Plc Open Xml format

Name: Save and export (Native Xml)
Desc: Saves the project and exports all data to the folder of the active project in Codesys native Xml format

Name: NOT PUBLIC: Generate docs
Desc: Saves the project, exports all data to the folder of the active project in PlcOpen Xml format and generates documentation using ia_tools
